Body:
"""test that 'caller' is non-None only if the immediate <%def> was called via <%call>"""
t = Template(
    """
        <%def name="a()">
        % if caller:
        ${ caller.body() } \\
        % endif
        AAA
        ${ b() }
        </%def>

        <%def name="b()">
        % if caller:
        ${ caller.body() } \\
        % endif
        BBB
        ${ c() }
        </%def>

        <%def name="c()">
        % if caller:
        ${ caller.body() } \\
        % endif
        CCC
        </%def>

        <%call expr="a()">
        CALL
        </%call>

        """
    )
assert result_lines(t.render()) == ['CALL', 'AAA', 'BBB', 'CCC']
